name: Meeting Joe - GameDevHQ Community Jam 2022
description:
Hi there!

"Meeting Joe": It is Friday evening; time to take the pants off and start watching THE GAME - when suddenly Joe has to fight a horde of zombies! Shoot the zombies before the time runs out, but be mindful: The more you kill, the more bullets are flying (and bouncing) around, posing an even bigger threat to the unskilled player :)

Enjoy a total of 3 levels, best played with a cold beverage and speakers on!

How to play
  • WASD to move around
  • Mouse to aim and mouse button 1 (left mouse) to shoot
  • Be mindful - the more you kill the more bullets are shot, which bounce off and can kill you; be strategic about your moves and watch your every step...
Future ideas for the game
  • Implement achievements which incentivise the player to play again 
  • More variety of enemy types
  • More impactful player feedback (screenshake, partciles on enemy hit?)
